message: Noiz suddenly reaches out to touch the burn on my side.
I jerk away, but it still hurts.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What the hell do you think you're doing?!"
Noiz looks at me with disdain.

name: ノイズ
message: "You got hurt. Because you protected me."

name: ノイズ
message: "But I didn't ask for your help. I don't get it. Why would you do that?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "This again... That thing woulda killed you. I saved your ass. What's the big deal?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Woulda killed you just as dead. A second slower, you'd be a smear on the wall."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...You're not wrong there."

name: ノイズ
message: "But you still jumped out in front. Doesn't make sense. You got a death wish or something?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey! Why do you have to put it like that? I don't expect you to thank me or anything, but come on! What about you? You don't care if you die?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Nope."
The blood rushes to my head in an instant. Before I can stop myself, I've punched Noiz square in the face.
I look at my fist, then at Noiz's face, shocked.
His cheek is red and a trickle of blood is leaking from the corner of his mouth.
Shit.
He smirks as he licks the blood from his lip.

name: ノイズ
message: "...Bring it on."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ngh!"
Heat explodes on my cheek as Noiz returned the punch.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oww... You little―!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ow! You little shit!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Shut up and fight!"
We exchange punches again and again, until finally, he pushes me to the floor and mounts me.
His knee presses against the burn on my side.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Agh! That really fucking hurts!"
He squeezes his legs tighter around me. The little shit is doing it on purpose!

name: 蒼葉
message: "Owww... Get off! I said that fucking hurts!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Ngh."
Incensed by the pain, I pull my leg up and knee him in the crotch as hard as I can.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Shit, sorry...!"
